18th century Italian, marble, Memento Mori. "Respice post te. Hominem te memento.” @colnaghi1760
Seen in #Portland. Thanks @humblegatherer! My mom would have been so tickled to see this! Thanks for sending it to me @ty_gunn_
Wow, really fun and fascinating talking with @mrapinoe!  Really enjoyed it! Check out the full interview at cnn.com
Can’t wait to interview @mrapinoe on @andersoncooper360 tonight at 8pm! What would you like to know about her?

In the end, after all else is stripped away, there is only love. My mom believed in love more than anyone. It was her guide, her solace, it’s what drove her, and in her final moments, it is what surrounded her. “i love you, you know that,” she would say to me, and i did, i knew it from the moment i was born, and i will know it till the moment i die. It was her greatest gift to me.
Pre-sale tickets now available for our NEW #AC2 show! #Cincinnati 10/4; #Chicago 10/5; #Houston 10/25; #Nashville 10/26 - use code AC2 for pre-sale tickets now @ticketmaster. More info at AC2Live.com
Two more shots from @entertainmentweekly’s new Pride issue. Clearly, i have just two awkward poses. Photos by @carterbedloesmith for EW

Just got sent one of several covers of @entertainmentweekly’s Pride issue. Here is the link to the article: https://ew.com/celebrity/ew-cover-lgbtq-issue-stonewall-50th-anniversary/?utm_source=smsshare. photos by @carterbedloesmith for EW.

Thanks for all the kind birthday wishes! To make myself feel especially old, I dredged up some old photos. One is a photo booth picture that I used for my first press pass. Another is me videotaping at a wedding in Vietnam in 1991, when I was going to school there. The last photo is by #dianearbus, who stayed at our house taking pictures of me and my brother for a project she was working on (i know, i know, @bravoandy, very relatable.)
HAPPY BIRTHDAY!!! @bravoandy. So proud of all you’ve done, and for you and  Baby Benjamin, it’s just the beginning!

Went over to @bravoandy’s to work on our upcoming shows in #NYC at the @beacontheatre and ended up playing with baby Benjamin instead. He is the best baby and i couldnt stop smelling and kissing him. Im obsessed.

#tbt Afghanistan, Helmand Province, 2009. Photo by #TimHetherington. Last time I saw Tim, i joked that i couldn’t show anyone this photograph because i look like a tool, and it is so well framed, people would think it was photoshopped. It wasn’t. We’d just gotten off that helicopter and he suddenly told me to stop. Then he snapped the picture. Tim was killed in Misrata, Libya, April 20, 2011. He was just 40. A great journalist and a  wonderful human being.

Tonight on @60minutes I profile the extraordinary artist #MarkBradford, who makes abstract paintings out of layers of paper he cuts, power washes and sands. He didn’t sell his first painting till he was nearly 40. Back then he was still working as a hair stylist in his mom’s beauty shop. Now at 57, he is widely considered one the most important and influential American artists. @hauserwirth
In the Amazon about 11 years ago.
Had an amazing trip to #EasterIsland. Tonight the story airs on @60minutes. #RapaNui.🗿🗿🗿🗿

Did you know that White Walkers’ mouths are all sprayed to turn them black? It doesnt taste very good. And yes, this is me after 4 hours of makeup by the @gameofthrones team. More behind the scenes of #GOT on @60minutes Sunday.

Went to @bravoandy’s house to discuss AC2 upcoming shows, but ended up just talking with this adorable guy! Come see us live on stage in #BALTIMORE 5/11; #NYC 6/21, 6/22. Tickets and info @ac2live.com
I’m so thankful for all the men and women of the @nypd. It is the toughest job imaginable, and i appreciate all their hard, and dangerous work! @hudsonyards. #theVessel

Big Bird came to help me host the official opening of @hudsonyards in NYC. A photographer kept shouting “Bird, look this way!” I thought Mr. Bird would be more appropriate, or Big, but Big Bird seems cool with it. He is very upbeat!

Nothing like starting the week with a haircut and a straight razor shave by Eric, a great barber @neighborhoodbarbers. Though i do always think for a moment that someone is going to come in and slit my throat. I think I’ve watched the Godfather too much.

Just got shown these. Taken with Marines in Helmand Province, Afghanistan in 2009. They were and are doing such tough work. Second one with photojournalist @neilhallsworth. I miss being out in the field.
Photos by: Lance Cpl Phillip Elgiee and Lance Cpl James Purschwitz.
Sent to me by @anderson.cooper.fanpage
I could stare at @bravoandy’s son all day long. And i sort of want to be swaddled too. photo by @bravoandy

Happy 95th Birthday to my mom, @gloriavanderbilt. Still painting everyday @gloriavanderbiltstudio. Still dreaming and creating, still believing the next great love is right around the corner. Who knows? Maybe she is right? I love you, Mom.
Just got sent this by @bravoandy. He took it ten years ago.  Seems like the blink of an eye. I think I still have that t shirt, and i definitely still have those pale, skinny, chicken legs.
My dog, Lily, likes to study old globes and plan her next adventure. #welshspringerspaniel

My Dad.
Wyatt Cooper. 
Sept 1, 1927- Jan 5, 1978.
Still missed, and loved, everyday.

When i was 17 i left high school early and rode on an #encounteroverland truck for about 6 months, from South Africa to the Central African Republic. This photo was taken in the Ituri rainforest in #Zaire, now the Democratic Republic Of Congo. I’d been hospitalized with malaria, and was still recovering. 1985.
Got to meet @SullyHWBush. Such a good boy! Amazing what dogs can do for our military veterans. #AmericasVetDogs

rehearsing for tonight’s @cnnheroes with @kellyripa, who is so generous with her time and love! The @cnnheroes are so inspiring! See them tonight starting at 8pm. And thank you @ricky_martin for the shirt and for all you are doing for #PuertoRico through @rm_foundation.
So happy that @bravoandy is back again with me this New Year’s Eve! Can’t wait! #CNN

Why is @bravoandy grooming me like a chimp? This weekend our #SanFrancisco AC2 show is sold out, but still some tickets available for Saturday, Dec 1 in #LosAngeles! We are sooo excited for both shows! Come see us live @dolbytheatre. Tickets at ac2live.com

#tbt first press pass that I used overseas in conflicts in #Myanmar, #Somalia, #Bosnia, and #Rwanda and a bunch of other places starting in 1991. Can’t believe I survived some of those places, and have been doing this for 27 years. It has been the great privilege of my life to bear witness around the globe.

Let us not remember the names of those who’ve killed, let us remember the names of those who’ve lived with dignity and kindness, and courage: David and Cecil Rosenthal. Joyce Fienberg. Melvin Wax. Rose Mallinger. Bernice and Sylvan Simon. Daniel Stein. Jerry Rabinowitz. Irving Younger. Richard Gottfried. #Pittsburgh.

Leaving Las Vegas. Amazing to be on stage at the Colosseum last night. Next saturday our new #AC2 show stops in #Philly, then #sanfrancisco 11/30/18 and #LosAngeles 12/1/18. come see us! tickets at ac2live.com (photo by @brucebozzi)
#tbt when i was just starting to work as a reporter for #channelone news. 1992.
Polaroid by artist #LucasSamaras. @craigfstarrgallery

How many nights dancing? How many early mornings? How many laughs and giggles? How many silly stories told, and memories made? How many rooftop dinners and concerts and trips? How many confidences shared? More than I can ever thank you for. There is no one else like you, and I am so lucky to have you in my life. I love you. Happy birthday @kellyripa
On vacation, hanging out with the sweetest dog.
On some trip, some airport, I think, somewhere, sometime.
So nice to come home and find a warm pup waiting. #Welshspringerspaniel
Sleepy in Seoul... I had a great time in this really cool city! 감사합니다 서울! (I hope i got that right. Thank you #Seoul!)

Frozen mango on a stick.... maybe the best thing ever! Just one of several dozen things i love about #Seoul. Such a cool city! I may have to stop and get another frozen mango popsicle before speaking at the  #CNHForum2018 tomorrow.... and maybe one afterwards. Come on NYC where are the frozen mango popsicles?
Happy Birthday @madonna! Thankfully, this photo gives little indication of the absolutely pathetic job i did dancing when she pulled me on stage with her.
Was an honor to have met @arethasings while filling in with @kellyripa. What a life... what a talent... what a contribution she made!
Back when i had a buzz cut.

30 years ago today, my brother, Carter Cooper, died by suicide. He was 23 years old. I miss him, and think about him every day.  The shock of his death is as painful today as it was thirty years ago. • THANK YOU FOR ALL YOUR COMMENTS, THEY ARE EXTRAORDINARILY MOVING AND MEANINGFUL TO ME. THANK YOU FOR SHARING YOUR OWN LOSSES AND EXPERIENCES WITH ME.

Tonight on @colbertlateshow @bravoandy and I talk #AC2. (Thanks Andy for the TERRIBLE pic of me!) Come see us in #WashingtonDC 9/29,  #LasVegas 10/26; #Philly 11/3, #SanFrancisco 11/30, #LosAngeles12/1. Tickets at AC2Live.com

Join me for a brand new interactive news show only on Facebook starting tonight, and on every weekday night, at 6:25pm est. The biggest stories of the day, and YOU get to weigh in. #FullCircle. Link in bio above!
i may look a little grumpy anchoring close to midnight in #Helsinki, BUT I think i am already in love with this city and its people.
sleepy saturday. maybe someday i will actually be able to grow a beard. #IWantToBeLikeBlitzer.

Just came across this painting by 17th century Italian artist, #AndreaVaccaro, who was heavily influenced by #Caravaggio and #Ribera. Entitled “Saint Lawrence Led To His Martydom,” it now joins two other similar works by Vaccaro that I love. Thanks @colnaghi1760

37 years ago today this article appeared in the @nytimes... page A20. Know your history... and never forget. Follow @lgbt_history, @theaidsmemorial, @onearchives, @thechristopherstreetreader, @whereloveisillegal, @nyclgbtsites on instagram. photo credit @lgbt_history #Whatisrememberedlives
Wet and smelly Lily, drifting off to sleep. #welshspringerspaniel
One more #TBT. Nine years old. I must have really liked Saturday Night Fever. or Fantasy Island.
#tbt Taken in the Amazon, releasing a sloth back into the wild. I love sloths. circa 2006

When I was 17 in Zaire, now called the Democratic Republic of Congo. I’d left high school early and had been in Africa for months. This was taken soon after I had been hospitalized in Kenya with malaria. I didnt tell my mom I’d been sick until I got home weeks after this picture was taken, I didn’t want her to worry.
A Summit coffee at the #fullertonhotelsingapore
#TBT Working in an artillery field near Kiryat Shmona, #Israel in 2006, close to the border with Lebanon.

Thanks for all the lovely birthday wishes!  Strange feeling being older than my father when he died. I never expected to live longer than he did. First photo by @richardphibbs, Second photo by my dad, Wyatt Cooper
Trying to nap, but my dog has other plans.

Happy Birthday @bravoandy! So proud of you, and all the amazing things you’ve done since we first met 26 years ago!  Come see Andy and me in #Charlotte 6/15 or #Orlando 6/16 or #LasVegas 10/26. Tickets at AC2Live.com

#tbt 2009 in Helmand Province, #Afghanistan. Watching a meeting of local village elders with U.S. Marines. @andersoncooper360. Photo by the kind and talented, #TimHetherington, killed in Libya in 2011.

Happy Mother’s Day to a true original, my mom, @gloriavanderbilt. At 94 she is still working, still creating art. Check it out @gloriavanderbiltstudio. Also check out the documentary about her #NothingLeftUnsaid” it’s on @HBO Go.

Working in #Haiti, one of my favorite countries, this weekend. We first met Monley when he was rescued from the rubble of his home a week after the earthquake. He is in school, studying hard, and now wants to be either a doctor or a soccer player.

I’m not one to take pictures of food, or rave about meals, but just ate at a really great, new pizza place in #sanfrancisco called @CheFico. So good, and a fun, casual vibe. If you’re in San Francisco check it out! My buddy @jonathanmtucker is one of the owners. Best food i’ve had in a long time!
Lily after running through the woods. Muddy dog, long tongue.#welshspringerspaniel

I can’t begin to explain how @theaidsmemorial has changed my life and my perspective. It is the best site I follow on instagram. Every day @theaidsmemorial allows me to see the faces and read the stories of men and women who were just like you and me, men and women who had their lives cruelly cut short. Maybe more people don’t follow it because they think it will be depressing. I certainly have cried reading it, but I have also been inspired and changed by the people whose names I’ve come to know. Ron Werner wrote of his first boyfriend, Wayne Emerson Black, “Gone. Dead. Forgotten in the invisible war, HIV/AIDS, that so many Americans at the time refused to see or acknowledge. He was here. He was important. He was incredible.” Wayne Was Here. They All Were Here. Help Remember Them. Every Day. Always.

@the_aids_memorial is an incredibly moving and powerful instagram account to follow. It is a daily remembrance of those whose lives were cut short. I am so thankful to hear their stories and learn their names. #whatisrememberedlives

My mom just joined instagram @gloriavanderbilt. She thinks it is the best thing ever. she has 30k followers and can't believe that many people would want to follow her. Now she emails me several times a day asking for advice about what to post next.

Sandy Gallin was a friend to so many, and i am lucky that i knew him for as long as i did. Another like him will not pass this way. He was deeply loved and will be deeply missed.
Funny who you can run into on a plane! #jamieleecurtis - a long lost sister perhaps?
